bot_description: A customizable Discord bot template for server management and community engagement!
welcome_description:
I'm **Template Bot**, your customizable Discord bot featuring:

**Server Management** - Moderation, roles, channels & more
**Ticket System** - Professional support ticket management
**Polls & Utilities** - Engage your community

Type `/help` to see all available commands!
features_list:
Server Management
Ticket System
Polls & Utilities
Customizable
